official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1987, 1988, and 1989 for Older American Volunteer Programs.
short_title: Older American Volunteer Programs Amendments of 1986

summary.text: Older American Volunteer Programs Amendments of 1986 - Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for FY 1987 through 1989 for the National Older Americans Volunteer Programs.

titles.title: Older American Volunteer Programs Amendments of 1986
A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1987, 1988, and 1989 for Older American Volunteer Programs.
